18649e52-c142-47f2-9ef4-ef4735f6f74a.description: A Certified Fearless Living Coach (CFLC) is a graduate of the most comprehensive life coaching training program in the world and the only program that specializes in the mastery of emotional fears using our proprietary method: The Wheels. Dedicated to the Art of Coaching, we embody "how" to coach anyone about anything using Fearless Conversations: 8 Coaching Skills. Fueled by heart, we believe in mentorship so much we supervise our student-client coaching sessions 6x the national average.
18649e52-c142-47f2-9ef4-ef4735f6f74a.name: Certified Fearless Living Coach (CFLC)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed prerequisite course: Fearless Living Training Program Enhanced with 6 one-on-one Mentor Coaching Sessions with a Master Coach.
Completed all course material in the Life Coach Certification Program, including video/audio lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Completed a minimum of 75 study-client coaching hours demonstrating the proprietary principles of Fearless Living including the Wheel methodology while utilizing 8 Coaching Skills.
Completed 18 one-on-one Mentor Sessions with a Master Certified Fearless Living Coach included supervised student-client coaching sessions.

skills.name: Speak As If They Are Innocent
Speak As If They Can Do It

1aa7f42e-3c80-45f2-9073-a0386c9dd848.description: Credentialed Fearless You "Fearbusters" understand how to identify and transform the emotional fears that hold people back from fulfilling their destiny. Students increase their ability to access more clarity, confidence, and connection in order to live the life their soul intended™. With support from Certified Fearless Living Coaches and like-minded community members, they experience a deeper sense of meaning, take more intentional risks and awaken their heart to create a more Fearless World™.
1aa7f42e-3c80-45f2-9073-a0386c9dd848.name: Fearless You "Fearbuster" - Founding Member One Year

badge_template_activities.title: Fearless You is a comprehensive program designed by Rhonda Britten to support destiny seekers in mastering the life skills, soft skills, and fearless skills they need to awaken their essential nature and live the life their soul intended™. Through our 4-week Transformation Cycle, access to our Certified Fearless Living Coaches, and like-minded community support, students gain the confidence, clarity, and connection they need to live without fear.

4c0143ab-37c1-42f8-8770-affc05a55b5f.description: A Certified Fearless Trainer (CFT) is a graduate of our 6-month Business-in-a-Box program on how to facilitate a group the work of Fearless Living, virtually or in-person; includes an in-person 5-day Intensive. All CFTs are eligible to facilitate 5 different Fearless Living Workshops. All CFTs are Certified Fearless Living Coaches credentialed through the Fearless Living Institute.
4c0143ab-37c1-42f8-8770-affc05a55b5f.name: Certified Fearless Trainer (CFT)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course material in the Business-in-a-Box program, including video lessons, live classes, and 5-day Intensive.
Completed final project facilitating a workshop while running the back of the room, building a support team, and coordinating with other facilitators in front of a live audience.
Must be a current credentialled Certified Fearless Living Coach.

7fe70168-dbe6-47d2-a560-dccb7a9180e0.description: Advanced Certified Fearless Living Coach is a coach who has continued to advance their Fearless Coaching skills by receiving additional Mentor supervised client coaching hours as well as studied and implemented one of Rhonda Britten’s books into their personal and professional life and coached a client through the process. They have more than 350 hours of coaching experience.
7fe70168-dbe6-47d2-a560-dccb7a9180e0.name: Advanced Certified Fearless Living Coach (ACFLC)

badge_template_activities.title: More than 350 hours of coaching experience.
Successfully passed Written and Oral Coaching Exams.

skills.name: Speak As If They Are Innocent
Speak As If They Can Do It

9db12940-f915-4488-9673-dd6ca087a275.description: Master Certified Fearless Living Coach are coaches who truly walk the Fearless Path and desire to provide their clients with an expansive set of tools. Master Certified Fearless Living Coaches have more than 1000 hours of coaching experience and have been mentored and supervised by a Mentor Certified Fearless Living Coach as well as passed written and oral tests to achieve this distinction.
9db12940-f915-4488-9673-dd6ca087a275.name: Master Certified Fearless Living Coach (MCFLC)

badge_template_activities.title: Master Certified Fearless Living Coaches have more than 1000 hours of coaching experience and have been mentored and supervised by a Mentor Certified Fearless Living Coach as well as passed written and oral tests to achieve this distinction.

skills.name: Speak As If They Are Innocent
Speak As If They Can Do It

0a8c4175-620f-43cc-840a-1a238422e122.description: An Advanced Certified Fearless Trainer is a graduate of our Advance CFT Program. All Advanced CFTs are eligible to facilitate the Fearless Living Training Program (FLTP). All CFTs and Advanced CFTs are Certified Fearless Living Coaches credentialed through the Fearless Living Institute.
0a8c4175-620f-43cc-840a-1a238422e122.name: Advanced Certified Fearless Trainer

badge_template_activities.title: Certified Fearless Trainer (CFT)

3d74301b-879c-446f-acf3-edc9b50e53bc.description: Mentor Certified Fearless Living Coach is a coach who has achieved the highest level of certification through the Fearless Living Institute. They have a deep desire for mastery and excellence and want to give back by mentoring the next generation of Certified Fearless Living Coaches. They show their love and enthusiasm for the Fearless Living work by coaching more than 750 hours.
3d74301b-879c-446f-acf3-edc9b50e53bc.name: Mentor Certified Fearless Living Coach

badge_template_activities.title: Show your love and enthusiasm for the Fearless Living work by coaching more than 750 hours.

skills.name: Speak As If They Are Innocent
Speak As If They Can Do It

8e81d948-1fad-4560-a544-6221d5bcaea9.description: Master CFTs have passed training to teach multiple-day live workshops of the Fearless Living copyrighted material. All Master CFTs are Certified Fearless Living Coaches credentialed through the Fearless Living Institute.
8e81d948-1fad-4560-a544-6221d5bcaea9.name: Master CFT

badge_template_activities.title: Advanced Certified Fearless Trainer
Must be a current credentialled Certified Fearless Living Coach.

da45c87d-2b80-478f-a0f3-c829eb4b2123.description: A Certified Fearless Living Associate (CFLA) is a graduate of the only program that specializes in showing you how to master your emotional fears using our proprietary method: The Wheels. Fueled by heart.
da45c87d-2b80-478f-a0f3-c829eb4b2123.name: Certified Fearless Living Associate (CFLA)

badge_template_activities.title: Fearless Foundations Workshop (FFW) - Over three full days together in person, you will be immersed in the foundational and transformative work of Fearless Living.

Fearless Conversations Workshop (FCW) - Throughout two days together in person, you will learn and practice the eight most important Fearless Living communication skills that will best support you as a Coach – as well as elsewhere in your life
Completed all course material in the Associate Certification Program (ACP), including video/audio lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Completed 12 one-on-one Mentor Sessions with a Master Certified Fearless Living Coach included supervised student-client coaching sessions.
